review:
1. Dental surgery( bone graft , cleanup of infected tooth, membrane support), fixing of implants done very well. 
2. Competent , efficient, experienced doctors
2. State of the art techniques used
3. Good professional efficient staff 
4. The premises is spacious bright  and clean

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: There was a lady doctor who inspected the mouth and explained the issues in detail to me. Then I was asked to do an x-ray which was in the third floor and completed immediately. The report was mailed to the doctor who inspected it by the time we came down. The areas of treatment were explained in detail once again and the next appointment was suggested. Overall, I was very satisfied by the fact that I was given enough information about what was wrong and what would be done. In addition, multiple treatments were suggested but not forced upon, which was a welcome change.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It's always a great experience at Dr. Sankpal's. The entire staff is so polite and humble. We have visited a couple of times and they treat so well. They *on't charge unnecessarily. Last time I visited for my wife's checkup. However we also wanted a checkup for our child and they didn't charge a single rupee for it.

1. Dental surgery( bone graft , cleanup of infected tooth, membrane support), fixing of implants done very well. 
2. Competent , efficient, experienced doctors
2. State of the art techniques used
3. Good professional efficient staff 
4. The premises is spacious bright  and clean

review:
I was happy with the sanitizing process. Doctor explained everything in detail. 
He was also very open on the cost and the chances of recovery.
A must visit place for solutions
Mohan Iyengar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very nice experiience and Dr. Rajendra Sankpal s very gentle on the teeth! Awesome first experience!!
The doctor didn't even see the patient once - it was all done by assistants. He was busy with some other patient and we wnt at the appointment time.
Very experienced and explained the issues clearly..listen to our issues. Relief from the  pain.. highly recommended.
